thread.title: Everything to know about Baylor-Kansas, including predictions, analysis, TV info and more
thread.title_full: Everything to know about Baylor-Kansas, including predictions, analysis, TV info and more | Dallas Morning News

author: SportsDayDFW.com
title: Everything to know about Baylor-Kansas, including predictions, analysis, TV info and more
text:
No. 3 Baylor at Kansas
Every game could mean the end of Baylor's national title hopes, and this week's matchup against Kansas is no different.
Baylor played its first Power Five opponent of the season last week, Texas Tech, and passed with flying colors. Now at No. 3 in the nation, Baylor will need to play like a legitimate national title contender against a Kansas team that is plain bad.
Kansas is undergoing major rebuilding under new head coach David Beaty. The Jayhawks have yet to win a game and lost to FCS South Dakota State in the first game of the season. After losing to Iowa State last weekend, you would be hard-pressed to find a win on their schedule.
But in Big 12 play, teams can not overlook opponents. Baylor has to put Kansas away or risk slipping in the polls. -- Shehan Jeyarajah
Who: No. 3 Baylor (4-0, 1-0 Big 12) at Kansas (0-4, 0-1)
When: 11 a.m. Saturday
Where: Memorial Stadium in Lawrence, Kan.
TV/radio: Fox Sports 1 / KSKY-AM (660)
Line: Baylor -44 (as of Tuesday afternoon)
Full coverage: Predictions, analysis and more
